overview: The 'More Information' page of Digital Experience Healthcare provides users with search, filter, and sort capabilities to explore healthcare services. It includes a navigation bar, accessibility features, and dynamic service card placeholders for loading states.
key_components: Sticky navigation bar with theme toggle
Page header with title and subtitle
interactions: Clicking navigation links to switch pages
Toggling dark mode via theme toggle button
Typing in search input to filter services
Clicking filter chips to apply category filters
Selecting sort options to reorder results
data_flow: User input in search field triggers filtering of service cards
Filter chip selection updates displayed services by category
Sort dropdown changes order of displayed services
Skeleton loaders replaced by fetched service data once available
accessibility: ARIA roles and labels on navigation and controls
Visually hidden labels for search input
aria-pressed states on toggle and filter chips
analytics: Track search input usage and query terms
Track filter chip selections and combinations
test_ideas: Verify skip-to-content link focuses main content
Validate navigation links route correctly and active state updates
Ensure theme toggle updates aria-pressed and visual theme
Test search input filters visible service cards dynamically
Confirm filter chips toggle aria-pressed and filter results
Validate sort dropdown reorders service cards correctly
Check skeleton loaders are replaced by service cards after data load
Run accessibility audit for ARIA compliance and keyboard navigation
